info.name: Amber
info.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

normalattack.name: Sharpshooter
normalattack.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

elementalskill.name: Explosive Puppet
elementalskill.description: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage. Baron Bunny ·Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. ·Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. ·When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Hold Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw. Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

elementalburst.name: Fiery Rain
elementalburst.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.\n\nAmber's passion truly burns hot.

p1.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
p1.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

p2.name: Precise Shot
p2.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

p3.name: Gliding Champion
p3.description: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

const1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
const1.description: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

const2.name: Bunny Triggered
const2.description: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.\nExplosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

const3.name: It Burns!
const3.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

const4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
const4.description: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

const5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
const5.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

const6.name: Wildfire
const6.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

hyperlinks.name: Tidal Shock
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when a character triggers Vaporize on an opponent, dealing Hydro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Blazing Explosion
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when a character triggers Vaporize on an opponent, dealing Pyro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Lingering Seed
hyperlinks.description: Each Dendro Core created will create 1 Lingering Seed around the current active character (Max {0} simultaneously): They are consumed after touching an opponent, dealing Dendro DMG to that opponent

hyperlinks.name: Wildfire Wave
hyperlinks.description: A tally will be kept on each opponent when Burning reaction DMG is inflicted on them. When any tally reaches {0}, the count will be reset, dealing AoE Pyro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Combustion Core
hyperlinks.description: Triggers after a character's Dendro DMG hits a Burning opponent, deals Dendro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Pyro Crystal's Boon
hyperlinks.description: All party members gain {0}% Pyro and Geo DMG Bonus. Additionally, you will obtain nearby Crystallize shards every {1}s

hyperlinks.name: Ignition Wave
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed at the character's position every {0}s while Pyro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing AoE Pyro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Stoneshard Strike
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed at the character's position every {0}s while Pyro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing AoE Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Electro Crystal's Boon
hyperlinks.description: All party members gain {0}% Electro and Geo DMG Bonus. Additionally, you will obtain nearby Crystallize shards every {1}s

hyperlinks.name: Roaring Rockbreaker
hyperlinks.description: Descends on the opponent's position after characters hit an opponent with an attack while Electro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Roaring Rockbreaker
hyperlinks.description: Descends on a nearby opponent after characters pick up {0} Elemental Shards produced by the Electro Crystallize reaction, dealing Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Embrittle
hyperlinks.description: Decreases opponents' Pyro and Electro RES by {0}%, max {1} stack(s)

hyperlinks.name: Explosive Orb
hyperlinks.description: After dealing Electro DMG to an Embrittled opponent, deal Pyro DMG to every Embrittled opponent on the field

hyperlinks.name: Thunderstrikes
hyperlinks.description: After dealing Pyro DMG to an Embrittled opponent, deal Electro DMG to every Embrittled opponent on the field

hyperlinks.name: Vigorous Nexus
hyperlinks.description: When characters trigger the Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread reactions on an opponent, fires off a projectile at them that explodes on impact, dealing AoE Dendro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Teeming Thunder
hyperlinks.description: Descends after a character deals Electro or Dendro DMG to a Quickened opponent, dealing Electro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Windblessing: Hydro
hyperlinks.description: The DMG dealt by characters triggering the Swirl reaction increases by {0}% and their Max HP increases by {1}%

hyperlinks.name: Healing Hydroball
hyperlinks.description: Records the amount of HP healed by characters, and explodes when its duration ends, dealing AoE Hydro DMG to nearby opponents based on the amount of healing recorded and the number of stacks of Windblessing: Hydro

hyperlinks.name: Waterfall Maelstrom
hyperlinks.description: Pulls in nearby opponents and deals AoE Hydro DMG to them based on the number of stacks of Windblessing: Hydro

hyperlinks.name: Windblessing: Electro
hyperlinks.description: The DMG dealt by characters triggering the Swirl reaction increases by {0}% and each time they receive Windblessing: Electro, all party members gain {1} Elemental Energy

hyperlinks.name: Razorflash Thunderblade
hyperlinks.description: When characters use an Elemental Burst, gain Razorflash Mark. When the active character's attacks hit opponents, consume the Razorflash Mark to unleash a Razorflash Thunderblade, dealing Electro DMG to all opponents in its path based on the number of Windblessing: Electro stacks

hyperlinks.name: Boltleap Thunderstrike
hyperlinks.description: While Windblessing: Electro is active, when a Plunging Attack hits an opponent, deals AoE Electro DMG based on the number of Windblessing: Electro stacks

hyperlinks.name: Electrosurge
hyperlinks.description: DMG dealt by Electro-Charged reactions triggered by party members is increased by {0}%, while party members' Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by {1}%

hyperlinks.name: Driftthunder Blitzcore
hyperlinks.description: While Electrosurge is active, follows the active character, firing 3 Electro bullets that deal Electro DMG at opponents hit by the character

hyperlinks.name: Thundercloud
hyperlinks.description: While Electrosurge is active, randomly uses one of the following attacks at intervals of {0}s:\n1. Thundercloud Strike: Deals Electro DMG to opponents within the AoE, and the active character gains {1} Elemental Energy;\n2. Thundercloud Rainstorm: Deals Hydro DMG to opponents within the AoE, and the active character is healed for {2}% HP

hyperlinks.name: Pyro Crystal's Boon
hyperlinks.description: All party members gain {0}% Pyro and Geo DMG Bonus. Additionally, you will obtain nearby Crystallize shards every {1}s

hyperlinks.name: Stoneshard Strike
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed at the character's position every {0}s while Pyro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing AoE Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Roaring Rockbreaker
hyperlinks.description: Descends on the opponent's position when characters hit them with a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack while Pyro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Cryo Crystal's Boon
hyperlinks.description: All party members gain {0}% Cryo and Geo DMG Bonus. Additionally, you will obtain nearby Crystallize shards every {1}s

hyperlinks.name: Stonecrystal Strikes
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed at the character's position periodically while Cryo Crystal's Boon is active, dealing AoE Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Iceshard Stoneburst
hyperlinks.description: Descends on the opponent's position when Cryo or Geo characters in your party deal a CRIT Hit while Cryo Crystal's Boon is active, dealing Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Frostfall
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when an active Pyro character triggers the Melt reaction, dealing Cryo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Flamespire
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when an active Cryo character triggers the Melt reaction, dealing Pyro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Significant Thermocline
hyperlinks.description: Characters deal {0}% increased Melt DMG

hyperlinks.name: Windblessing: Pyro
hyperlinks.description: The DMG dealt by characters triggering the Swirl reaction increases by {0}% and their ATK increases by {1}%.

hyperlinks.name: Galeblaze
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when an active character deals DMG to an opponent with an attack, consuming their HP and dealing AoE Pyro DMG based on the number of Windblessing: Pyro stacks

hyperlinks.name: Firestorm
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when Pyro or Anemo party members take the field, dealing AoE DMG of that character's Elemental Type based on the number of Windblessing: Pyro stacks

hyperlinks.name: Stinging Chill
hyperlinks.description: All party members' Cryo and Hydro CRIT DMG is increased by {0}%

hyperlinks.name: Coldstream Wave
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when an active Cryo character triggers Frozen on an opponent, dealing AoE Hydro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Frigidfloe Wave
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed when an active Hydro character triggers Frozen on an opponent, dealing AoE Cryo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Rupturing Rime
hyperlinks.description: Opponents' Hydro and Cryo RES is decreased by {0}%, max {1} stack(s)

hyperlinks.name: Yielding
hyperlinks.description: Opponents' Cryo and Electro RES is decreased by {0}%, and Physical RES is decreased by {1}%, max {2} stack(s)

hyperlinks.name: Surging Shock
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed after characters deal Physical DMG to an opponent affected by Yielding, dealing Physical DMG at most once every {0}s

hyperlinks.name: Hydro Crystal's Boon
hyperlinks.description: All party members gain {0}% Hydro and Geo DMG Bonus, and Lunar-Crystallize DMG is increased by {2}%. Additionally, you will obtain nearby Crystallize shards every {1}s.

hyperlinks.name: Stoneshatter Strike
hyperlinks.description: Unleashed at the character's position periodically while Hydro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing AoE Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Stone Stream
hyperlinks.description: Descends on the opponent's position when Hydro or Geo characters in your party are healed while Hydro Crystal's Boon is active, dealing Geo DMG

hyperlinks.name: Frost-Twined Thorn
hyperlinks.description: Deal one instance of Cryo and Dendro AoE DMG to each nearby enemy every {0}s. A maximum of 2 Frost-Twined Thorns can exist on the field at once

hyperlinks.name: Fulgurous Thorn
hyperlinks.description: After an Electro attack from a character hits an opponent within the AoE of a Frost-Twined Thorn, the Frost-Twined Thorn will transform into a Fulgurous Thorn that lasts for {0}s. Its attack frequency will be increased to once per second, and it will change to dealing {1}× the AoE Electro DMG

hyperlinks.name: Magnetizing Thorn
hyperlinks.description: Does not attack, but rather causes nearby enemies to take more Cryo, Dendro, Electro, and Physical DMG dealt by characters. The aforementioned buff is strengthened by {0}% for every Magnetizing Thorn on the field, up to a maximum of {1}%

hyperlinks.name: Windblessing: Cryo
hyperlinks.description: The DMG dealt by characters triggering the Swirl reaction increases by {0}% and their CRIT DMG increases by {1}%

hyperlinks.name: Coldrime
hyperlinks.description: Applied when characters hit opponents with their attacks while Windblessing: Cryo is active. Opponents will periodically take Cryo DMG based on the number of Windblessing: Cryo stacks

hyperlinks.name: Icemist
hyperlinks.description: Released when characters sprint while Windblessing: Cryo is active, drawing in nearby opponents and dealing Anemo DMG based on the number of Windblessing: Cryo stacks
